original_title: Journey of Faith: The New World
overview: A sequel to the acclaimed Journey of Faith documentary, this stunning film presents startling insights from 32 top scholars as they continue the journey into the Book of Mormon's thousand-year span, giving insight into this sacred text. Mormon's description of the land, religious history, culture, and traditions create a fascinating mosaic. Beautiful images filmed on location in Guatemala and Mexico combined with the art of Joseph Brickey illuminate the rich history of the Book of Mormon.
tagline: Evidences of the Book of Mormon in the Americas
title: Journey of Faith: The New World
